column2: Is NOT old enough to Marry
This councillor is currently not forbidden to lead armies.\n§GClick to recall and forbid your councillor from leading armies.§!
This councillor is currently forbidden to lead armies.\n§GClick to allow this councillor to lead armies.§!
§Y[Recipient.GetFirstName] will be released from prison if [Recipient.GetSubjectPronoun] accepts.§!

My dear [Root.GetTitle],

I have learned that there are certain factions within the realm working to undermine my rule. If you are involved or planning to become so, I trust that your complicity in these matters ends now.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
Ha! This letter was an act of desperation.

Honored [Root.GetTitle],

Fine! I do not like this, but for the sake of the continued prosperity of the realm, I will agree to support any faction of yours. Please don't make me regret this.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

Would you like to help us improve Crusader Kings II by collecting data on playing habits and the popularity of downloadable content and mods? If you agree, anonymous data concerning Crusader Kings II will be sent to Paradox Interactive when you play the game. Paradox Interactive will not and can not use this data to find out anything about the users.
Help us Improve Crusader Kings II?
